mapper.select: select * from collection where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select * from (collection co left join tag t on co.tag_id = t.id) left join museum m on co.museum_id = m.id where co.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or co.location like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or t.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select co.name as `naem`, t.naem as `tag`, m.name as `museum`, d.name as `dynasty` from ((collection co left join tag t on co.tag_id = t.id) left join museum m on co.museum_id = m.id) left join dynasty d on d.id = co.dynasty_id where co.id = #{collectionId} limit 1
